  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    io.micronaut.data.r2dbc.repository.ReactorCrudRepository
    Replaced by ReactorCrudRepository
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    io.micronaut.data.r2dbc.annotation.R2dbcRepository.PARAMETER_TX_STATUS
    Transaction status key needs to be created using the data source name to allow propagating of multiple data source transactions
    io.micronaut.transaction.reactive.ReactiveTransactionStatus.ATTRIBUTE
    The key cannot be constant in multi-tx environments. Replaced with ReactorReactiveTransactionOperations.getTransactionStatus(reactor.util.context.ContextView).
    io.micronaut.transaction.reactive.ReactiveTransactionStatus.STATUS
    The key cannot be constant in multi-tx environments. Replaced with ReactorReactiveTransactionOperations.getTransactionDefinition(reactor.util.context.ContextView).

    Use MatchContext.getMethodElement() and MatchContext.getReturnType().
    io.micronaut.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronizationManager.isSynchronizationActive()
